Interface IEngine

All Known Implementing Classes:
Engine
public interface IEngine
A public engine base interface with critical-only functions

  • Method Summary

    Static Methods
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static byte[]
    loadAnimationBytes(String anim)
    Get and return a byte sequence for type-based animations
    static void
    writeAnimationBytes(String anim, AnimationType type)
    Write and set a byte sequence for a specific type-based animation

    Types of animation:
    [PRE_CREATED] -> Pre-created animation (transform only);
    [PROCEDURAL] -> Procedural animation (events and response);
    [SKELETIC] -> Skeletic animation (skeleton only);

  • Method Details

    • loadAnimationBytes

      static byte[] loadAnimationBytes(String anim) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Get and return a byte sequence for type-based animations
      Parameters:
      anim - Animation name (ex: "ply_walk", "ply_jump")
      Returns:
      A byte blocks sequence (8 bits blocks)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when the name is invalid

    • writeAnimationBytes

      static void writeAnimationBytes(String anim, AnimationType type)
      Write and set a byte sequence for a specific type-based animation

      Types of animation:
      [PRE_CREATED] -> Pre-created animation (transform only);
      [PROCEDURAL] -> Procedural animation (events and response);
      [SKELETIC] -> Skeletic animation (skeleton only);
      Parameters:
      anim - Animation name (ex: "ply_walk", "ply_jump")
      type - The type of the type-based animation
